paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: ATTRm amyloidosis with exclusively cardiac phenotype

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The Ile68Leu mutation... represents the cause of 74% of ATTRm amyloidosis cases with exclusively cardiac phenotype recorded in our country.
The Ile68Leu mutation... represents the cause of 74% of ATTRm amyloidosis cases with exclusively cardiac phenotype recorded in our country.
The presence of a mutation gives the protein a more unstable conformation... but it continues to maintain its conformation until adulthood.
The presence of a mutation gives the protein a more unstable conformation... but it continues to maintain its conformation until adulthood.

functional_data.summary: The Ile68Leu mutation leads to a more unstable TTR protein conformation.

variants.source_location: Main Text, section on TTR characteristics
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is particularly relevant in Italy.
key_quotes: The presence of a mutation gives the protein a more unstable conformation.
